Module com.example.inventorymanagementapplication
Package com.example.inventorymanagementapplication.controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorymanagementapplication.controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that edits the products in the application.

    Method to remove part from the associatedParts and from the product by first confirming the part will be removed then setting the new product's part table to the new associatedParts without the part.
    void
    modifyProductSaveButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to save the product by assigning each information of each variable: id, name, inventory, price, min, and max by grabbing the text from each text fields and adding parts to the associated parts if the parts were added from the first table to the second table and then returning to the main screen and inputting the product in the product's table.
    void
    modifyProductSearchTextFieldAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to search through the product's parts search bar and add the parts to a temporaryParts ObservableList and if the part has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the parts in the list.

      Parameters:

      resourceBundle - for the resource.

    • modifyProductSaveButtonAction

      public void modifyProductSaveButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method to save the product by assigning each information of each variable: id, name, inventory, price, min, and max by grabbing the text from each text fields and adding parts to the associated parts if the parts were added from the first table to the second table and then returning to the main screen and inputting the product in the product's table. However, if the min is larger than the max, or if the inventory is smaller than the minimum or larger than the maximum, or if any of the text fields are empty then a warning message pops up.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • modifyProductSearchTextFieldAction

      public void modifyProductSearchTextFieldAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to search through the product's parts search bar and add the parts to a temporaryParts ObservableList and if the part has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the parts in the list. If the part is not found then an error message pops up on the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • modifyProductRemovePartButtonAction

      public void modifyProductRemovePartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method to remove part from the associatedParts and from the product by first confirming the part will be removed then setting the new product's part table to the new associatedParts without the part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
